Package it.unicam.cs.formula1.GameEngine

Class DefaultGameEngine

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.formula1.GameEngine.DefaultGameEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEngine
public class DefaultGameEngine extends Object implements GameEngine
Default implementation of the GameEngine interface. Provides methods to load, start, and manage the race.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultGameEngine

      public DefaultGameEngine(String filePath) throws TrackException, IOException, BotException
      Constructs a new DefaultGameEngine with the specified file path. Initializes the track and bots based on the configuration file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the track configuration file
      Throws:
      TrackException - if there is an error with the track configuration
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs reading from the file
      BotException - if there are issues with the bot configuration

    • updateRace

      public void updateRace()
      Description copied from interface: GameEngine
      Updates the race status, typically by calculating the next moves for all bots. ALso eliminates bots that have crashed during the race.
      Specified by:
